author: Michael McWhertor
title: Final Fantasy 7 Remake available for early preload
description: Square Enix sticking to Final Fantasy 7 Remake’s April 10 release date, but you can preload the 80 GB game on PlayStation 4 now.
content: Image: Square Enix Square Enix sticking to April 10 release date, but you should download it now Square Enix is letting Final Fantasy fans preload Final Fantasy 7 Remake a little early, in part thanks to the coronavirus pandemic and the resultant impact on in… [+1278 chars]
